posts.post_content:

Doc Crandall (Portrait, With Cap) - S460 - $100
slight horizontal crease below second button 

Josh Devore - S460 - SOLD
no creases, stain, ink transfer on front

Danny Murphy (Batting) - P460-42 - SOLD
horizontal crease below hands

Red Murray (Portrait) - S460 - $50
few creases; stain on back

Gabby Street (Portrait) - T - SOLD
oversized; bright and beautiful; minor wrinkles
Great cards Erick!!  good luck with the sale:)

I'll take the Murphy and Street !!

Thanks,

Adam
I'd would like the Devore card.  I love the background, and it would be my first S460.  I'll send a PM as well (still trying to figure out the best way to respond).
